00043 /**

00045  *
00046  */
00047 AdapterTypeNormTran::AdapterTypeNormTran(double dStyOnlySnpRatio, double dNspOnlySnpRatio, double dNspOnlyCnRatio,
00048     double dNspBothSnpRatio, double dNspBothCnRatio) :
00049     m_dStyOnlySnpRatio(dStyOnlySnpRatio), m_dNspOnlySnpRatio(dNspOnlySnpRatio), m_dNspOnlyCnRatio(dNspOnlyCnRatio),
00050     m_dNspBothSnpRatio(dNspBothSnpRatio), m_dNspBothCnRatio(dNspBothCnRatio)
00051 {
00052   m_uiCelFileCount = 0;
00053   m_uiCelFileIndex = 0;
00054   m_bAnnotationFilesProcessed = false;
00055   m_Type = ADAPTERTYPENORMSTR;
00056   setupSelfDoc(*this);
00057 
00058   setOptValue("StyOnlySnpRatio", ::getDouble(m_dStyOnlySnpRatio, 6));
00059   setOptValue("NspOnlySnpRatio", ::getDouble(m_dNspOnlySnpRatio, 6));
00060   setOptValue("NspOnlyCnRatio", ::getDouble(m_dNspOnlyCnRatio, 6));
00061   setOptValue("NspBothSnpRatio", ::getDouble(m_dNspBothSnpRatio, 6));
00062   setOptValue("NspBothCnRatio", ::getDouble(m_dNspBothCnRatio, 6));
00063   
00064 }

00070 std::string AdapterTypeNormTran::getDefaultOptions()
00071 {
00072   return "StyOnlySnpRatio=0.8287.NspOnlySnpRatio=0.7960.NspOnlyCnRatio=1.4218.NspBothSnpRatio=0.9954.NspBothCnRatio=1.6392";
00073 }

00075 /**
00076  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00077  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00078  */
00079 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> AdapterTypeNormTran::getDefaultDocOptions()
00080 {
00081   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00082   SelfDoc::Opt StyOnlySnpRatio = {"StyOnlySnpRatio", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.8287", "0.8287", "NA", "NA", "StyOnlySnpRatio"};
00083   SelfDoc::Opt NspOnlySnpRatio = {"NspOnlySnpRatio", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.7960", "0.7960", "NA", "NA", "NspOnlySnpRatio"};
00084   SelfDoc::Opt NspOnlyCnRatio = {"NspOnlyCnRatio", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.4218", "1.4218", "NA", "NA", "NspOnlyCnRatio"};
00085   SelfDoc::Opt NspBothSnpRatio = {"NspBothSnpRatio", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.9954", "0.9954", "NA", "NA", "NspBothSnpRatio"};
00086   SelfDoc::Opt NspBothCnRatio = {"NspBothCnRatio", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.6392", "1.6392", "NA", "NA", "NspBothCnRatio"};
00087 
00088   opts.push_back(StyOnlySnpRatio);
00089   opts.push_back(NspOnlySnpRatio);
00090   opts.push_back(NspOnlyCnRatio);
00091   opts.push_back(NspBothSnpRatio);
00092   opts.push_back(NspBothCnRatio);
00093   return opts;
00094 }

00096 void AdapterTypeNormTran::setup(const std::string& strAnnotationFileName, ChipLayout* pobjChipLayout, unsigned int uiCelFileCount)
00097 {
00098   m_uiCelFileIndex = 0;
00099   m_uiCelFileCount = uiCelFileCount;
00100   m_strAnnotationFileName = strAnnotationFileName;
00101   m_pobjChipLayout = pobjChipLayout;
00102   if ((m_strAnnotationFileName == "") || (!Fs::isReadable(m_strAnnotationFileName))) {
00103     Err::errAbort("AdapterTypeNormTran::AdapterTypeNormTran() - An existing annotation-file must be specified.");
00104   }
00105   if (m_pobjChipLayout == NULL) {
00106     Err::errAbort("AdapterTypeNormTran::AdapterTypeNormTran() - ChipLayout pointer cannot be NULL.");
00107   }
00108   loadAnnotation();
00109 }

00115  * function is called.  This makes it difficult to pass through data
00116  * to downstream.

00118 void endDataSet();

00138 bool AdapterTypeNormTran::isPm(int iIndex)
00139 {
00140   return m_mxAdapterPMTypes.get(iIndex) == 1;
00141 }
00142 bool AdapterTypeNormTran::isSnp(int iIndex)
00143 {
00144   return m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == 1;
00145 }
00146 bool AdapterTypeNormTran::isCn(int iIndex)
00147 {
00148   return m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == 2;
00149 }
00150 char AdapterTypeNormTran::getNspAdapterType(int iIndex)
00151 {
00152   return m_mxAdapterNspTypes.get(iIndex);
00153 }
00154 char AdapterTypeNormTran::getStyAdapterType(int iIndex)
00155 {
00156   return m_mxAdapterStyTypes.get(iIndex);
00157 }
00158 
00159 /**
00160  * @brief transform the intensity point supplied coming from a particular
00161  * probe in a particular microarray.
00162  *
00163  * @param iProbeIndex - Probe index from the cel file.
00164  * @param iChipIndex - chip index from sample.
00165  * @param intensity - Original intensity.
00166  */
00167 inline float AdapterTypeNormTran::transform(int iProbeIndex, int iChipIndex, float intensity)
00168 {
00169   char cNspAdapterType = getNspAdapterType(iProbeIndex);
00170   char cStyAdapterType = getStyAdapterType(iProbeIndex);
00171   if (isSnp(iProbeIndex)) {
00172     if ((cNspAdapterType == -1) && (cStyAdapterType >= 0)) {
00173       intensity = (float)(intensity * m_vGrandMedians.get(iChipIndex) / m_mxStyOnlySnpMedians.get(iChipIndex, cStyAdapterType) * m_dStyOnlySnpRatio);
00174     } else if ((cNspAdapterType >= 0) && (cStyAdapterType == -1)) {
00175       intensity = (float)(intensity * m_vGrandMedians.get(iChipIndex) / m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.get(iChipIndex, cNspAdapterType) * m_dNspOnlySnpRatio);
00176     } else if ((cNspAdapterType >= 0) && (cStyAdapterType >= 0)) {
00177       intensity = (float)(intensity / m_mxStyBothSnpMedians.get(iChipIndex, cStyAdapterType));
00178       intensity = (float)(intensity * m_vGrandMedians.get(iChipIndex) / m_mxNspBothSnpMedians.get(iChipIndex, cNspAdapterType) * m_dNspBothSnpRatio);
00179     }
00180   } else if (isCn(iProbeIndex)) {
00181     if ((cNspAdapterType >= 0) && (cStyAdapterType == -1)) {
00182       intensity = (float)(intensity * m_vGrandMedians.get(iChipIndex) / m_mxNspOnlyCnMedians.get(iChipIndex, cNspAdapterType) * m_dNspOnlyCnRatio);
00183     } else if ((cNspAdapterType >= 0) && (cStyAdapterType >= 0)) {
00184       intensity = (float)(intensity / m_mxStyBothCnMedians.get(iChipIndex, cStyAdapterType));
00185       intensity = (float)(intensity * m_vGrandMedians.get(iChipIndex) / m_mxNspBothCnMedians.get(iChipIndex, cNspAdapterType) * m_dNspBothCnRatio);
00186     }
00187   }
00188   return intensity;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void AdapterTypeNormTran::newChip(std::vector<float> &data)
00192 {
00193   initializeData(data);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void AdapterTypeNormTran::newDataSet(IntensityMart* iMart)
00197 {
00198   std::vector<float> data;
00199   int dataSetCount = iMart->getCelDataSetCount();
00200   m_TransformedIMart = iMart;
00201   // if there aren't any chipstream nodes after this, then don't store
00202   // all of the intensities
00203   if (m_Streams.empty()) {
00204     m_TransformedIMart->setStoreAllCelIntensities(false);
00205   }
00206   for (int d = 0; d < dataSetCount; d++) {
00207     data = iMart->getCelData(d);
00208     newChip(data);
00209     for (uint32_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
00210       data[i] = transform(i, d, data[i]);
00211     }
00212     m_TransformedIMart->setProbeIntensity(d, data);
00213   }
00214   chipStreamPassNewChip(m_TransformedIMart);
00215 
00216 }
00217 
00218 /**
00219  * @brief Method for being passed a new cel file worth of data. Calculates
00220  * and stores the median (or average) of data supplied.
00221  * @param data - Vector of cel file data from same sample.
00222  */
00223 void AdapterTypeNormTran::initializeData(const std::vector<float>& data)
00224 {
00225   // Grand Median.
00226   AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vIntensities((int)data.size());
00227   int iProbeIndex = 0;
00228   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00229     if (isPm(iIndex)) {
00230       vIntensities.set(iProbeIndex, data[iIndex]);
00231       iProbeIndex++;
00232     }
00233   }
00234   m_vGrandMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, vIntensities.median(iProbeIndex));
00235 
00236   for (int y = 0; (y < m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.getYDimension()); y++) {
00237     m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00238     m_mxNspOnlyCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00239     m_mxStyOnlySnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00240     m_mxStyBothSnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00241     m_mxStyBothCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00242     m_mxNspBothSnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00243     m_mxNspBothCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, y, 0);
00244   }
00245 
00246   for (char cAdapterType = 0; (cAdapterType < m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.getYDimension()); cAdapterType++) {
00247     m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getNspOnlyMedian(data, (char)1, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00248     m_mxNspOnlyCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getNspOnlyMedian(data, (char)2, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00249     m_mxStyOnlySnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getStyOnlyMedian(data, (char)1, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00250     m_mxStyBothSnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getStyBothMedian(data, (char)1, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00251     m_mxStyBothCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getStyBothMedian(data, (char)2, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00252   }
00253 // Verbose::progressStep(1);
00254   std::vector<float> med_norm(data.size());
00255 
00256   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00257     if ((getNspAdapterType(iIndex) >= 0) && (getStyAdapterType(iIndex) >= 0)) {
00258       if (isSnp(iIndex)) {
00259         med_norm[iIndex] = data[iIndex] / (float)m_mxStyBothSnpMedians.get(m_uiCelFileIndex, getStyAdapterType(iIndex));
00260       } else if (isCn(iIndex)) {
00261         med_norm[iIndex] = data[iIndex] / (float)m_mxStyBothCnMedians.get(m_uiCelFileIndex, getStyAdapterType(iIndex));
00262       }
00263     }
00264   }
00265 // Verbose::progressStep(1);
00266   for (char cAdapterType = 0; (cAdapterType < m_mxNspBothSnpMedians.getYDimension()); cAdapterType++) {
00267     m_mxNspBothSnpMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getNspBothMedian(med_norm, (char)1, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00268     m_mxNspBothCnMedians.set(m_uiCelFileIndex, cAdapterType, getNspBothMedian(med_norm, (char)2, cAdapterType, vIntensities));
00269   }
00270   m_uiCelFileIndex++;
00271 }
00272 
00273 double AdapterTypeNormTran::getNspOnlyMedian(const std::vector<float>& data, char cProbeSetType, char cAdapterType, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vIntensities)
00274 {
00275   int iProbeIndex = 0;
00276   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00277     if ((m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == cProbeSetType) && (getNspAdapterType(iIndex) == cAdapterType) && (getStyAdapterType(iIndex) == -1)) {
00278       vIntensities.set(iProbeIndex, data[iIndex]);
00279       iProbeIndex++;
00280     }
00281   }
00282   return vIntensities.median(iProbeIndex);
00283 }
00284 
00285 double AdapterTypeNormTran::getStyOnlyMedian(const std::vector<float>& data, char cProbeSetType, char cAdapterType, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vIntensities)
00286 {
00287   int iProbeIndex = 0;
00288   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00289     if ((m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == cProbeSetType) && (getNspAdapterType(iIndex) == -1) && (getStyAdapterType(iIndex) == cAdapterType)) {
00290       vIntensities.set(iProbeIndex, data[iIndex]);
00291       iProbeIndex++;
00292     }
00293   }
00294   return vIntensities.median(iProbeIndex);
00295 }
00296 
00297 double AdapterTypeNormTran::getNspBothMedian(const std::vector<float>& data, char cProbeSetType, char cAdapterType, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vIntensities)
00298 {
00299   int iProbeIndex = 0;
00300   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00301     if ((m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == cProbeSetType) && (getNspAdapterType(iIndex) == cAdapterType) && (getStyAdapterType(iIndex) != -1)) {
00302       vIntensities.set(iProbeIndex, data[iIndex]);
00303       iProbeIndex++;
00304     }
00305   }
00306   return vIntensities.median(iProbeIndex);
00307 }
00308 
00309 double AdapterTypeNormTran::getStyBothMedian(const std::vector<float>& data, char cProbeSetType, char cAdapterType, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vIntensities)
00310 {
00311   int iProbeIndex = 0;
00312   for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; iIndex < data.size(); iIndex++) {
00313     if ((m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.get(iIndex) == cProbeSetType) && (getNspAdapterType(iIndex) != -1) && (getStyAdapterType(iIndex) == cAdapterType)) {
00314       vIntensities.set(iProbeIndex, data[iIndex]);
00315       iProbeIndex++;
00316     }
00317   }
00318   return vIntensities.median(iProbeIndex);
00319 }

00321 /**
00322  * @brief Signal that no more data is coming (i.e. newChip() will
00323  * not be called anymore. Currently the class builds up all the
00324  * summaries and figures out the normalization factores when this
00325  * function is called.  This makes it difficult to pass through data
00326  * to downstream.
00327  */
00328 void AdapterTypeNormTran::endDataSet()
00329 {
00330 // Verbose::out(1, "endDataSet()");
00331   // Flush data in stream.
00332 
00333   chipStreamEndChips();
00334 
00335   // Reset for new reading cycle.
00336   m_uiCelFileIndex = 0;
00337 }

00339 /**
00340  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00341  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00342  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00343  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00344  *
00345  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00346  *
00347  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00348  */
00349 SelfCreate* AdapterTypeNormTran::newObject(std::map<std::string, std::string> &param)
00350 {
00351   SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00352   double dStyOnlySnpRatio = 0;
00353   double dNspOnlySnpRatio = 0;
00354   double dNspOnlyCnRatio = 0;
00355   double dNspBothSnpRatio = 0;
00356   double dNspBothCnRatio = 0;
00357   fillInValue(dStyOnlySnpRatio, "StyOnlySnpRatio", param, doc);
00358   fillInValue(dNspOnlySnpRatio, "NspOnlySnpRatio", param, doc);
00359   fillInValue(dNspOnlyCnRatio, "NspOnlyCnRatio", param, doc);
00360   fillInValue(dNspBothSnpRatio, "NspBothSnpRatio", param, doc);
00361   fillInValue(dNspBothCnRatio, "NspBothCnRatio", param, doc);
00362   AdapterTypeNormTran* p = new AdapterTypeNormTran(dStyOnlySnpRatio, dNspOnlySnpRatio, dNspOnlyCnRatio, dNspBothSnpRatio, dNspBothCnRatio);
00363   return p;
00364 }
00365 
00366 void AdapterTypeNormTran::loadAnnotation()
00367 {
00368   Verbose::out(1, "AdapterTypeNormTran processing annotation for " + ::getInt(m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount()) + " probes.");
00369 
00370   Verbose::progressBegin(1, "AdapterTypeNormTran::processAnnotationFiles(...) ", 2, 1, 2);
00371   /*
00372   Verbose::out(1, "StyOnlySnpRatio = " + ::getDouble(m_dStyOnlySnpRatio, 6));
00373   Verbose::out(1, "NspOnlySnpRatio = " + ::getDouble(m_dNspOnlySnpRatio, 6));
00374   Verbose::out(1, "NspOnlyCnRatio = " + ::getDouble(m_dNspOnlyCnRatio, 6));
00375   Verbose::out(1, "NspBothSnpRatio = " + ::getDouble(m_dNspBothSnpRatio, 6));
00376   Verbose::out(1, "NspBothCnRatio = " + ::getDouble(m_dNspBothCnRatio, 6));
00377   */
00378   m_mxAdapterProbeTypes.initialize(m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount()); // 0 == ProbeType (1 = Snp, 2 = Cn)
00379   m_mxAdapterPMTypes.initialize(m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount()); // 1 = PM Probe (0 or 1)
00380   m_mxAdapterNspTypes.initialize(m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount());
00381   m_mxAdapterStyTypes.initialize(m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount());
00382   for (int x = 0; (x < m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeCount()); x++) {
00383     m_mxAdapterNspTypes.set(x, -1);
00384     m_mxAdapterStyTypes.set(x, -1);
00385   }
00386 
00387   AffxString strProbeSetName;
00388   // Identify pm only probes.
00389   int iProbeSetCount = m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeSetCount();
00390   for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++) {
00391     ProbeListPacked List = m_pobjChipLayout->getProbeListAtIndex(iProbeSetIndex);
00392     ProbeSet* ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(List);
00393     strProbeSetName = ps->name;
00394     if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFR")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("Random")) ||
00395                 (strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("CN")) ||
00396                 (strProbeSetName.startsWith("S-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("C-")) ||
00397                 (strProbeSetName.startsWith("chr"))) {
00398       for (unsigned int iAtomIndex = 0; (iAtomIndex < ps->atoms.size()); iAtomIndex++) {
00399         for (unsigned int iProbeIndex = 0; (iProbeIndex < ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes.size()); iProbeIndex++) {
00400           if (Probe::isPm(*ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes[iProbeIndex])) {
00401             int iIndex = ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes[iProbeIndex]->id;
00402             m_mxAdapterPMTypes.set(iIndex, (char)1);
00403           }
00404         }
00405       }
00406     }
00407     delete ps;
00408   }
00409   Verbose::progressStep(1);
00410   int iMaxAdapterCode = 0;
00411   iMaxAdapterCode = Annotation().loadAnnotationForAdapterTypeNormTran(m_strAnnotationFileName, *m_pobjChipLayout, m_mxAdapterProbeTypes, m_mxAdapterNspTypes, m_mxAdapterStyTypes);
00412 
00413   m_vGrandMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount);
00414   m_mxNspOnlySnpMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00415   m_mxNspOnlyCnMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00416   m_mxStyOnlySnpMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00417   m_mxStyOnlyCnMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00418   m_mxNspBothSnpMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00419   m_mxNspBothCnMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00420   m_mxStyBothSnpMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00421   m_mxStyBothCnMedians.initialize(m_uiCelFileCount, iMaxAdapterCode + 1);
00422   Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00423 }
00424 
00425 void AdapterTypeNormTran::setCelFileIndex(unsigned int ui) {
00426   m_uiCelFileIndex = ui;
00427 }
